name: Orders
description: Sales analytics from order processing. Contains validated and enriched order data including customer information, line items, totals, and fulfillment status. Query via SQL or subscribe to real-time events.

business_glossary.order_total: Total amount including tax and shipping
business_glossary.line_items: Array of products in the order
business_glossary.customer_id: Reference to the customer who placed the order

sample_queries: SELECT date_trunc('day', created_at) as day, count(*) as orders, sum(order_total) as revenue FROM orders GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1
SELECT customer_id, count(*) as order_count FROM orders GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 2 DESC LIMIT 10
